fn.p: Funding. This work was funded by the HIV Outcomes Beyond Viral Suppression coalition, which receives funding from Gilead Sciences and ViiV. The funders had no role in the design or implementation of the study or the writing of the manuscript. JL is supported by a Spanish Ministry of Science, Innovation and Universities Miguel Servet grant (Instituto de Salud Carlos III/ESF, European Union [CP18/00074]).
